title: Jesus! What A Friend For Sinners!
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c

v1: Jesus! what a Friend for sinners!
Friends may fail me, foes assail me,
He, my Savior, makes me whole.
v2: Jesus! what a Strength in weakness!
Let me hide myself in Him;
He, my Strength, my vict'ry wins.
v3: Jesus! what a Help in sorrow!
While the billows o'er me roll,
Even when my heart is breaking,
He, my Comfort, helps my soul.
v4: Jesus what a Guide and Keeper!
While the tempest still is high,
Storms about me, night o'ertakes me,
He, my Pilot, hears my cry.
v5: Jesus! I do now receive Him,
More than all in Him I find;
I am His, and He is mine.
c1: He is with me to the end.
